statements.select: select * from aers_tbl_registereduser a LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_staff b on a.ReguserId=b.ReguserId LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_hospdep c on b.DepId=c.HospdepId where c.HospId=#HospId#

SELECT tempaers.AersUId,tempaers.AersHosp ,tempaers.AersDep,tempaers.AersName,tempaers.AersRemark,tempaers.AersState FROM (SELECT aers_tbl_hospital.HospName as AersHosp,aers_tbl_hospdep.HospId,aers_tbl_hospdep.HospdepName as AersDep,a.* FROM ( SELECT aers_tbl_registereduser.ReguserId as AersUId,aers_tbl_staff.DepId as AersDepId,aers_tbl_staff.`Name` as AersName,aers_tbl_staff.Remarks as AersRemark ,aers_tbl_staff.RoleState as AersState from aers_tbl_staff LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_registereduser on aers_tbl_staff.ReguserId = aers_tbl_registereduser.ReguserId where aers_tbl_staff.RoleState > 0 ) as a LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_hospdep on aers_tbl_hospdep.HospdepId = a.AersDepId LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_hospital on aers_tbl_hospdep.HospId = aers_tbl_hospital.HospId ) as tempaers WHERE tempaers.AersUId = #ReguserId#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO aers_tbl_registereduser ( ReguserId, LoginName, Password, IsFlag, Remarks, OperatorId, OperatorDate, Address
) VALUES ( #ReguserId#, #LoginName#, #Password#, #IsFlag#, #Remarks#, #OperatorId#, #OperatorDate#, #Address# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_registereduser SET LoginName = #LoginName#, Password = #Password#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, Remarks = #Remarks#, OperatorId = #OperatorId#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate# WHERE (ReguserId = #ReguserId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_registereduser SET Password = #Password#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate# WHERE (ReguserId = #ReguserId#)
